page.title: 12GOVERNMENT
page.content: There are 10 members of the Parish Council- 4 farmers,2 builders,a garage proprietor,a postmistress,an electrical engineer and a housewife. All are original inhabitants except one.Newcomers have shown little interest in becoming councillors. The council meets once a month in the village hall.There is a public participation session at each meeting -where people(Ave 7)can raise matters. Once a year there is a parish meeting for public discussion of local topics. A paid parish clerk is employed to deal with correspondence . Matters receiving most attention 1984. Traffic roads,signs etc.-27 items Planning -24 items;footpaths 16 items; playing field- swings,dogs,litter etc 12 items,compulsory purchase of land 10 items;ancient monuments 10 items;street lighting 8 items
